title: League won't open, getting an "error"
body: Just want to help my friend and he can't open League. When he tries to it says "Monitor display input speed set to 1920x1080@60HZ".

replies.body: This is an issue we're current looking into with updates being posted on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  In thea meantime, you can press Alt+Enter to toggle out of fullscreen to restore the game.  Hang tight until it's fixed up!
